# Evergreen (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Area:** 10-ft. radius

**Duration:** 1 hour/level and instantaneous; see text

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Frostburn (WotC), pg. 93

You imbue a 10-foot-radius area of plant life with magical heat, instantly healing 1d8 points of damage +1 point per caster level (maximum +10), and granting immunity to cold for the duration of the spell. Evergreen affects natural plants as well as creatures with the plant subtype.
